name: Nirikshitha Saiprasanth
about: A senior year student at the Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management, Gwalior, looking to break into the domains including but not limited to Analytics, Product Management and Consulting. Besides the scholastic front, I'm passionate about food, fashion, politics and mental health. Extremely expressive - a wordsmith as well as someone with the gift of the gab. Always up for a conversation about anything under the sun!
